      Snaps the specified player to the grid
      void AbstractGameMode.snapToGrid(Player pl)
      Snaps the player to the grid, where the grid is player x, y - 2 % 16 == 0 Will move a maximum of 0.1f in each direction.
      protected void AbstractGameMode.specialMovement(Player pl, byte type)
      Called when checkBoundaries determines that a player is on a special block.
